pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access to Captricity API // Get text from images of text using Captricity Optical Character Recognition (OCR) API. Captricity allows you to get text from handwritten forms --- think surveys --- and other structured paper documents. And it can output data in form a delimited file keeping field information intact. For more information, read https://shreddr.captricity.com/developer/overview/.
